The thing I do not get to work is to change locale during a session. Once the locale is set, it is set as if it was in application scope. I want users to be able to change language at any point of time during a session. %@ page contentType="text/html" %> <%@ taglib prefix="c" uri="WEB-INF/tags/c.tld" %> <%@ taglib prefix="fmt" uri="WEB-INF/tags/fmt.tld" %> <%-- Set the locale to the selected one, if any. Otherwise, let the action pick the best one based on the Accept-Language header. --%> <%-- Interpret user's locale choice --%> <% System.out.println("here"+request.getParameter("locale"));%> <%-- Offer locale choice to user --%> USA - Deutschland - French; <%-- Use URL rewriting to ensure proper session tracking --%>
